name: Gates
description: Japanese aluminum entry gates, driveway gates, and pool gates. Custom fit, outward opening, spacers/stationary options; custom fabrication and lock options. Corrosion resistant and maintenance-free.
descriptionLong: Sankyo-Tateyama aluminum gate systems distributed by KunkelWorks. Entry gate styles, driveway gates, and pool gates; custom fit and outward opening. Spacers and stationary panels available. Custom fabrication and lock options. Same meticulous Japanese fabrication as carports and patio covers—resilient to humidity, salt, and sun. Full gate series: kunkelworks.com/gate-series.
sizes: Custom sizes to fit opening; specify dimensions for quote
finishes: Anodized and coated aluminum; color options available
priceNote: Pricing by size and options; email requirements for quote.
attribution: Product info from KunkelWorks (kunkelworks.com). For details and pricing: info@kunkelworks.com. Gate series: kunkelworks.com/gate-series.

mce-gates.name: MCE Gates (NEW)
mce-gates.description: MCE and the taller MCE-H are the newest gate series; they replace MEX, MLW and MF. Panels re-designed with metal profile covering the whole panel top (no plastic top-caps). New vertical picket styles. See MCE Detail PDF.

mceh-gates.name: MCE-H Gates (NEW)
mceh-gates.description: Taller MCE-H gate series. New heights: H1700 (5.84') and H1900 (6.5'). Same metal panel top and new vertical picket styles as MCE. See MCE-H Detail PDF.

vomc.name: VOMC (6 styles)
vomc.description: Commercial grade gate series with open pickets. 6 picket styles and 3 colors. Style #5 beefy picket, #3 tight spacing, #1 can go to almost 10' with bent pickets up to 8.2'. Gates can be fitted on site. Matching Fence: VOF and REOF.
sizes: Max. Width DWG Single: 7.46' or less
Max. Width DWG Double: 14' or less

vpmc.name: VPMC (2 styles)
vpmc.description: Super popular in the US; good match for any 4" picket fence. Heights from 3.3' to 6'. Standard panel width 43"; easily fitted to any opening. Matching Fence: REPF and VPF.

wm.name: WM (10 styles)
wm.description: WM is the choice for Wood-Look gates. 5 wood-look combinations and 8 panel styles. Since 2018, style Y1 and SD available in all metal finish (Peter or Deep Brown). Taller: WM-T Series. Matching Fence: WF Series.

cast-aluminum-gates.name: Cast Aluminum
cast-aluminum-gates.description: Cast aluminum gates: solid aluminum (wrought-iron look without rust). Multiple styles; see Product Detail PDFs for ABS/ABB, ACS-1, AGB, AGC, AGK, AGY, APR, ALW, ART/AAM.

bamboo-gates.name: PVC Bamboo (2)
bamboo-gates.description: PVC Bamboo gates—look like real bamboo but stand up to weather. Traditional Japanese style; black ropes decorative. Light and dark color options. Same PDF as Bamboo fence.

sliding-gates.name: Sliding (8 styles)
sliding-gates.description: Sliding gate series; 8 styles. See Product Details PDF for specifications.

other-gates.name: Other Gates
other-gates.description: Many more gate styles from Japan, including various luxury styles. See Product Details PDF for options.

mex.name: MEX (8 styles)
mex.description: The MEX is the most popular gate series in Hawaii. 8 panel styles and 5 colors. Can reach height of 5'-6" which looks great next to a 6' wall. For higher gates see MF Series. All gates can be fitted on site; multi-pane bi-fold available up to 4.85'.
sizes: Max. Width Multiple Panel: 12.79' or less

mf.name: MF (8 styles)
mf.description: The MF is the Tall Gate Series. Same profile styles as MEX but larger, taller panels and more substantial posts. 8 panel styles, 4 metal colors; wood-look panels with horizontal semi-private or fully private options.

mlw.name: MLW (3 styles)
mlw.description: Alternative to MEX gates. 3 panel styles: strong vertical picket and two decorative designs. 3 colors: Black, Deep Brown and Bronze. Max height 4.85'. Multi-panel bi-fold up to 14.1' width. Matching Fence: FIN Series.
sizes: Max. Width Multiple Panel: 14.1' or less

mv.name: MV (8 styles)
mv.description: One of the most popular gate series in Japan for lower height gates. 13 panel styles and 7 colors. Ideal for 4' tall gates. Fitted on site; multi-panel bi-fold up to 4.19'. Matching Fence: FVX Series.
sizes: Max. Width Multiple Panel: 12.79' or less
